title: Apple has released iOS 15.4.1 to the public with bug fixes
content:
Apple has released iOS 15.4.1 to the public worldwide. This update brings security patches and bug fixes, and we advise all users to update their devices to this version. The company had seeded iOS 15.4 earlier this month, introducing new emoji, Face ID support when masked, and filtering options in the Podcasts app. It’s common

The post Apple has released iOS 15.4.1 to the public with bug fixes appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has seeded iOS 15.4.1, following the release of iOS 15.4 earlier this month. This update brings bug and security patches.
